summary: An Ordinance approving the assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 2162 for the improvement of North and East Fifty-eighth Street, from Kensington Place to Latona Avenue, all in the City of Seattle, by grading and curbing the same and providing for the necessary surface drainage, and by constructing concrete sidewalks thereon, under Ordinance No. 21721, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel and lot of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
